ovdesc.p: A work file holding the details of transactions received on the BGC incoming tapes.

desc.p: Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
Contains the total value in Guilders of the batch sent via the BGC in block coded 213.
Up to 11 numeric characters.
This field contains the information provided from the BGC under block coded 240. Payment reason / cheque number.
If the incoming transaction is of a cheque type this field will contain the cheque number.
32 type S (alpha or numeric) characters. Input externally only.
Contains the 5 digit code of dutch bank account numbers which indicates which bank holds the contra account.
Up to 5 numeric characters. Externally updated only.
Id of the customer whose static details have changed.
This id is calculated by the system consisting of the following concatenated together separated by '-'.
Tape Name Tape sequence number BGC run number BGC processing date Item on tape
38 alphanumeric characters.
Contains the transaction code as defined by the BGC which describes the transaction type.
2 numeric characters. Externally updated only.
This field contains a key to the file FT.BGC.TRANSACTION which contains all the associated starting positions and lengths of any associated narrative payment details which have been sent via the BGC.
This field contains all the narrative payment details associated with the particular transaction being processed via the BGC in tape.
Multivalued field. Each multivalue containing up to 35 type S (alpha or numeric) characters. Externally updated only.
This field is taken form the incoming BGC tape and contains the name of the account whose id is in field ACCOUNT.RESIDENT.
Up to 24 type S (uppercase alpha or numeric) characters. Externally updated only.
This field contains the amount in Guilders of the contained transaction.
Up to 12 numeric characters. Updated externally only.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
This field contains the id of the Funds Transfer that is generated in order to place the incoming transaction into the T24 system.
This field may be empty as a Funds Transfer is not always generated.
14 type SS (alpha numeric with first two alpha) characters. Input externally only.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
Contains the address as according to the BGC in tape of the holder of the contra account.
Up to 28 type S (upper case alpha or numeric) characters. Externally updated only.
Contains the enquiry number as sent via the BGC in BLOCK code 213.
Up to 8 characters. Externally updated only.
This contains the reference number sent from the BGC under block type 213.
Up to 12 type S (alpha or numeric) characters. Externally updated only.
This field indicates whether the owner of the account is resident in the Netherlands.
1 numeric character. Externally updated only.
This field is taken from the BGC in coming tape and is the T24 account which the transaction is against.
Up to 10 type S (uppercase alpha or numeric characters.) Externally updated only.
This field is taken from the incoming BGC tape and contains the name of the account whose id is in field ACCOUNT.
Up to 24 type S (uppercase alpha or numeric) characters. Externally updated only.
This field indicates whether the owner of the account is resident in the Netherlands.
1 Indicates that the account holder is a resident.
2 Indicates that the holder is NOT resident.
1 numeric character. Externally updated only.
This field indicates whether the bank has already processed the contained transaction prior to receiving these instructions.
2 indicates the transaction has already been booked and the BGC update is for information purposes only. If this is not equal to 2 a corresponding Funds transfer transaction will be produced.
1 numeric character. Externally updated only.
Identifies whether the incoming transaction is a debit or credit in favour of the account.
1 indicates a debit.
2 indicates a credit.
1 numeric character. Externally updated only.
This is a multi valued field. Standard T24 numeric field.
A maximum of 49 characters may be entered.
This is a NOINPUT, no copy field.
Contains the Account number for the other side of the deal, this should not be an account held by the bank.
Up to 24 type S (uppercase alpha or numeric) characters. Externally updated only.
Contains the T24 system date on which the tape was processed.
Standard T24 date format. Updated externally only.
This is a multi valued field. Standard T24 numeric field.
A maximum of 40 characters may be entered.
This is a NOINPUT, no copy field.
